params.text:
• Identify what the client wants
  • Identify patterns and perspectives through clients words and behaviours
  • Identify what the clients needs right now to grow

• Client understand how beliefs, thoughts and actions have shaped their outcomes.
  • Client acknowledge their power to shape their journey.
  • Client understands that choice is possible and sense empowerment.

• Coach holds a mirror on what has become familiar.
  • Client stimulated and makes connection/joins the dots.
  • Client realization and awareness of resources that are available to them.

• Coach supports by re-framing inconsistencies in clients beliefs/thoughts/actions.
  • The notion that 'Understanding is Power', but action is a choice is understood by clients. 
  • The client can embrace different possibilities/options.

• The client is sinpired to believe in themselves and their possibilities.
  • Coach excites the clients imagination with positive words and actions.
  • Coach and client create the momentum for change.

• Clients commit to planned sustainable actions and change.
  • Clients revisit and reinforce their Y.
  • Coach and client celebrate success and realization that everything is available to the client.
